name: Cactus Shaped Elevated Ceramic Cat Bowl
features: The bowl is bacteria resistant and lead-free, making it a safe choice for feeding your small pet.
Elevated bowl puts your pet’s mouth in a better position, relieving strain while eating and reducing common vomiting during and after meals.
Perfect for flat-faced cats and dogs, or cats who are occasionally pushed off the bowl.
Stable base reduces the number of tipped bowls, messy floors, and annoying clean-up.

name: Rabbit Ceramic Pet Drinking Fountain
features: Rabbit Automatic Power Off USB Drinking Fountain is a cute cat water fountain with a steady flow of filtered water.
Each part can be detachable, easy to clean
Automatic filtration system living water cycle. The smooth bottom is repeatedly polished, without hurting the ground.
The smart sensor automatically cut off the power supply when lacking water, preventing dry burning
